features.name: Dynamic Component Loader (Vite glob)
features.description: Discovers and lazy-loads React components at runtime using import.meta.glob registry. Supports alias normalization, base directory prefixes, bare-name resolution, and index.* conventions.

features.name: Dynamic Wrapper (Suspense + ErrorBoundary)
features.description: Runtime wrapper that resolves component config via getDynamicComponent, renders lazy-loaded components with Suspense fallback, and handles load errors with react-error-boundary.

features.name: Astro Dynamic Builder Route
features.description: Astro catch-all page that maps URL segments to component paths (kebab to PascalCase), preserves base directories, and renders the React component through DynamicWrapper inside the main layout.

features.name: Sample Components for E2E Assertions
features.description: Representative React components used by tests to verify dynamic loading behavior.

features.name: Utilities and Configuration
features.description: Project configs and utilities for TypeScript, Vite, Vitest, Tailwind, and Astro.
